function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on PCR for detection of SARS-CoV-2 in wastewater","Impact":"Limited accuracy and detection limits, potential for inaccurate results","Mitigation":"Exploration of alternative biomarkers and biomolecules, validation of new detection methods","Technologies":"Mass spectrometry (MS), ELISA, environmental proteomics","People":"Laboratory personnel, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of standardized evaluation and verification of RT-qPCR methods","Impact":"Potential for inconsistent and unreliable results across laboratories","Mitigation":"Evaluation and standardization of RT-qPCR methods, collaboration for verification","Technologies":"RT-qPCR, laboratory testing equipment","People":"Laboratory personnel, public health officials, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Complexity of wastewater matrix impacting detection methods","Impact":"Difficulty in treating and cleaning wastewater for accurate testing","Mitigation":"Development of wastewater treatment methods, exploration of concentration methods","Technologies":"Wastewater treatment technology, concentration methods","People":"Environmental engineers, laboratory personnel","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
